products.name: Refrigerator Door Shelf Bin
products.description: This manufacturer-certified Refrigerator Door Shelf Bin, also known as a crisper bin or door shelf bin, is made of clear plastic, and is easy to install. It is used to hold items in the fridge, like jars, cans, and condiments and you'll be able to visually see if the part is broken or cracked. This particular shelf attaches to the fridge door.
products.installation_guide:
1. Turn off water supply
2. Unplug refrigerator
3. Remove old ice shelf
4. Connect water line to new ice shelf
5. Secure mounting bracket
6. Plug in and test

repair_stories.title: Original Drawer self destructed along the hanging edge
repair_stories.symptoms: Original Drawer self destructed along the hanging edge
repair_stories.solution: Replaced it with a new one,Other Parts Used: Refrigerator Door Shelf Bin,Refrigerator Crisper Drawer

repair_stories.title: Replaced cracked door bin
repair_stories.solution: Easy, peasey. I popped the old one out and put the new one in. Less than 30 seconds.

products.name: Dishwasher Spray Arm
products.description: This lower spray arm assembly in your dishwasher distributes water and detergent during the washing cycle by spinning around and spraying water in different directions. You can usually find it attached to a support or hub at the bottom of the dishwasher. If this part is broken, you might notice some signs. You might hear a knocking or banging sound coming from the dishwasher. The spray arm may not rotate properly or might seem wobbly. It is important to replace a damaged arm assembly as your dishes will not get cleaned properly, and they will still have dirt on them even after a wash cycle. It can also cause the dishwasher to have a bad smell because of leftover food residue. To remove your existing arm assembly, you will need to release its locking mechanism before lifting it out of your appliance. Please be informed that this OEM-verified part is sold individually.
products.installation_guide:
1. Remove lower rack
2. Unscrew retaining nut
3. Remove old spray arm
4. Install new spray arm
5. Secure with retaining nut

repair_stories.title: Dishwasher Not Cleaning Properly
repair_stories.symptoms: Dishes not getting clean, poor water circulation

products.name: Refrigerator Water Filter
products.description: Premium water filtration system that removes contaminants and improves taste
products.installation_guide:
1. Locate filter compartment
2. Turn old filter counter-clockwise to remove
3. Insert new filter
4. Turn clockwise to lock
5. Run water for 5 minutes to flush

repair_stories.title: Water Filter Replacement
repair_stories.symptoms: Water flow reduced, filter indicator light on
repair_stories.solution: Replaced water filter, reset indicator light
